mapper.sql: c.fUuid AS `uuid`, c.fUserID AS `userID`, c.fEntryType AS `entryType`, c.fContactPerson AS `contactPerson`, c.fQQ AS `qq`, c.fEmail AS `email`, c.fTelphone AS `telphone`, c.fAlipay AS `alipay`, c.fPaidFee AS `paidFee`, c.fType AS `type`, c.fRemark AS `remark`, c.fStatus AS `status`, c.fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, c.fCreateTime AS `createTime`
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_customer c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.fContactPerson like '%#{customerCriteria.contactPerson}%' AND c.fQQ like '#{customerCriteria.qq}%' AND c.fTelphone like '%#{customerCriteria.telphone}%' AND c.fUserID = #{customerCriteria.userID} AND c.fStatus = #{customerCriteria.status} order by c.fUpdateTime DESC
SELECT c.fContactPerson AS 'contactPerson', c.fUuid AS 'uuid' FROM t_customer c WHERE c.fStatus = 1 order by c.fContactPerson
